Regulator has link to firm implicated in outbreak

The owners of the Framingham company at the heart of a nationwide outbreak of meningitis also own a related pharmacy, one of whose executives is a board member of the state agency that regulates pharmacies. (Globe)

Raw meat diet for your pet

Raw diets include the whole animal, including organs and ground bone. They can be served in carcass form or ground up and formed into patties.
